network_overview: The capture shows 100 % failed VoLTE/VoNR call attempts between IMS clients and the core. All four calls are rejected with SIP 407 “Proxy Authentication Required”, followed either by user-initiated CANCEL (calls #1-#2) or setup-timeout (calls #3-#4). No RTP/media flows are present, indicating bearer resources were never allocated.

observations.finding: 8 INVITEs across 7 UDP flows, all challenged with 407; no second INVITE carries credentials → authentication loop
Zero RTP packets; media bearer never established, so voice service is effectively down

root_causes.issue: Missing IMS AKA credentials in UE
root_causes.description: Every initial INVITE is answered with 407 Proxy Authentication Required, but the UE re-submits INVITE without an Authorization header (digest/AKA). This implies the UE has no valid ISIM credentials or the P-CSCF is not configured to challenge correctly.
root_causes.impact: All VoLTE/VoNR calls fail; subscribers cannot originate or receive voice calls.

root_causes.description: Calls #3-#4 stop at 180 Ringing and are marked FAILED with reason INVITE_SETUP_TIMEOUT after <1 s, although 180 arrived ~850 ms after INVITE. This suggests a client or SBC timer <1 s, far below 3GPP recommended T9=10 s.
root_causes.impact: Calls prematurely classified as failed; CDRs will show false negatives and customers may redial repeatedly.

recommendations.action: Verify ISIM integrity: check that UE contains valid IMS private identity (IMPI) and secret key; if missing, push new ISIM OTA or replace UICC.
recommendations.rationale: Without credentials UE cannot respond to 407 challenge, blocking every call.

recommendations.action: Audit P-CSCF authentication policy: ensure it requests digest-AKA and not plain MD5; confirm 401/407 is sent only once per call attempt.
recommendations.rationale: Repeated challenges increase signaling load and call set-up time.

recommendations.action: Increase SIP T1/T9 timers in UE and SBC to 3GPP defaults (T1=500 ms, T9=10 s) to avoid spurious timeout alarms.
recommendations.rationale: Prevents premature call abortion when far-end alerting is slightly delayed.

recommendations.action: Collect simultaneous Diameter Wx/Mw traces (UAR/UAA) to confirm HSS returns correct authentication vectors.
recommendations.rationale: Isolates whether failure is in UE, P-CSCF or HSS.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Control-plane is alive (SIP 100/180/183/200 seen) but authentication procedure breaks every call.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP Create-Bearer-Request/Response observed; QCI-1 bearer never established, therefore no user-plane.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No RTP flows ⇒ no MOS, packet-loss or jitter can be measured; service is unavailable rather than degraded.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Signaling failure (407) stops bearer creation, so user-plane never starts; fixing SIP auth will automatically allow bearer set-up.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant P-CSCF
    participant S-CSCF
    UE->>P-CSCF: INVITE (no auth)
    P-CSCF->>UE: 407 Proxy Auth Required
    UE->>P-CSCF: ACK
    UE->>P-CSCF: INVITE (still no auth!)
    P-CSCF->>S-CSCF: 407 (relayed)
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 183 Session Progress
    P-CSCF->>UE: 183 Session Progress
    UE->>P-CSCF: PRACK
    S-CSCF->>P-CSCF: 180 Ringing
    P-CSCF->>UE: 180 Ringing
    Note over UE,P-CSCF: No 200 OK → caller CANCELs
    UE->>P-CSCF: CANCEL
    P-CSCF->>UE: 487 Request Terminated
    UE->>P-CSCF: ACK
